item.title: Shop Dont Work!
item.dc:creator: @Infamous_Gangster Infamous Gangster
item.description:
@Infamous_Gangster wrote:

[quote=“Epic Ancient, post:2, topic:296441”]Here’s one of my shops…

} else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop PutNPCCoords = true; WanneShop = 2; //Aubury Magic Shop

Did you place what the shop sells into shops.cfg, and autospawn the npc?[/quote]

.\Java\client.java:6135: 'else' without 'if' } else if (NPCID == 553) { //Aubury rune shop ^ .\Java\client.java:6217: orphaned case case 17: //second Click npc ^ 2 errors Press any key to continue . . .

2 errors.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: August 20, 2009, 03:45:45 pm[/size][hr]help please @!@?
